alldb.table_sql:
select ci.id, ci.project_name projectname, crp.mail_add mailadd, crp.mobile_number mobilenumber, crp.person_name_ personname, crp.post_code postcode
from contract_info ci left join cust_related_person crp on crp.cust_id=ci.cust_id where ci.contract_status=31 and crp.main_person_flag='æ˜¯'
